useCase.name: Update User Profile

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and wants to update their profile information.

useCase.trigger: User enters updated profile information and submits the update form.

mainSequence.step: User submits the profile update form.
Profile Page sends HTTP POST /profile/update with updated info to Profile Controller.
Profile Controller calls UserService to updateUserProfile with updated info.
If validation fails, UserService returns validation errors to Profile Controller, which displays them on Profile Page.
If validation succeeds, UserService saves the updated user info to UserRepository.
UserRepository updates the user information in the Database.
UserRepository returns the update confirmation to UserService.
UserService returns the update confirmation to Profile Controller.
Profile Controller redirects to the profile page.
Profile Page displays the updated profile information to the User.
